tool_description: Identifies and removes duplicate usage records across different data sources and platforms to prevent double-counting of music usage and royalties.

usage_records.description: Array of validated usage record strings

matching_criteria.description: Fields to use for duplicate detection

time_tolerance_minutes.description: Time tolerance for matching usage events (0-1440 minutes)

deduplication_strategy.description: Strategy for handling duplicates: keep_first, keep_last, keep_highest_value, merge

error_messages: Record limit exceeded: Maximum 100000 usage records per deduplication batch.
Invalid matching criteria: Provide 2-10 valid field names for duplicate detection.
Invalid time tolerance: Time tolerance must be between 0-1440 minutes (24 hours).
Unsupported strategy: Use keep_first, keep_last, keep_highest_value, or merge for deduplication_strategy.
usage: Provide usage_records array and matching_criteria for duplicate detection. Configure time_tolerance_minutes and deduplication_strategy based on your data requirements.

deduplicated_records.description: Array of usage records with duplicates removed

duplicates_removed.description: Number of duplicate records that were removed

deduplication_report.description: Summary report of deduplication process and results
